title: Umm honor lvl 1
body:
Oke i just got chat restricted bcs i typed these in my chat
note they were 4 togheter and were flaming me
Game 1
Pre-Game
Markoets: jng
In-Game
Markoets: 3 EXTRA AD
Markoets: BROKEN
Markoets: how am i trolling
Markoets: report kaisa really toxic
Markoets: oke mr dead
Markoets: report XD
Markoets: ty bot lane
Markoets: say bye to ur acc
Markoets: our botlane really toxic XD
Markoets: i mean  u will like get banned
Markoets: Xd
Markoets: no i didnt
Markoets: i wanted to go to the base
Markoets: This kaisa so mad abt nroamls XD
Markoets: :(
Markoets: called me a r word
Markoets: Thats alotta dmg
Markoets: no u
Markoets: That double crit move
Markoets: im not running it down
Markoets: and u are toxic
Markoets: no
Markoets: idc
Markoets: now i see why kaisa mad
Markoets: more losses than wins in ranked
Markoets: and 1.3k games
Markoets: nice 2/11 akali game btw
Markoets: oh and kaisa u got carried also in ranked
Markoets: nice
Markoets: yes
Markoets: debatable
Markoets: ur not better at the mental game bcs  u getting mad
Markoets: flame
Markoets: XD
Markoets: int XD
Markoets: report mid and bot
Markoets: just a bad game

like they were making me tilt and feel shit and i got chat restricted
hella sad 
did i get chat restricted bcs i said jng at the pregame dont know

replies.body:
you got punished for asking for reports:

>Markoets: report kaisa really toxic
Markoets: oke mr dead
Markoets: report XD

for being a dick to others:

>Markoets: our botlane really toxic XD
Markoets: i mean u will like get banned
Markoets: Xd

>Markoets: This kaisa so mad abt nroamls XD
Markoets: :(

and 

for harassment and score shaming:

>Markoets: now i see why kaisa mad
Markoets: more losses than wins in ranked
Markoets: and 1.3k games
Markoets: nice 2/11 akali game btw
Markoets: oh and kaisa u got carried also in ranked

>Markoets: report mid and bot

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

>Markoets: say bye to ur acc

{{champion:43}} 's a bitch, right?

{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

season ends today. why couldn't you **not** mess up on the last day? just... why?

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Oke but he called me a ape/retard and there was smth more i belive
but i didnt get a message telling that he got punished or smth
but ty for the info

>Oke but he called me a ape/retard and there was smth more i belive

someone else being toxic "first" does not make it ok for you to be toxic too

>but i didnt get a message telling that he got punished 

that's because you don't always get notified when a punishment happens

it's intentional

nobody knows the actual probability but 15% is the number most people agree on

Well ty for the info
now i know not to talk in chat just put it away or make it as small as possible.

or

you know... talk without being rude, harrassing and condescending... that works too...
Well yeah but i MAY get a bit angry and this might happen again

you could "/muteall"

but the problem with doing that is that it doesn't prevent **_you_** from lashing out despite nobody writing anything "first"

Well yeah but better not take chances
beacuse some ppl in the elo i play well
to say it nicely
aint the sharpest tools in da shed
and i might get frustrated and just type without really thinking

>just put it away or make it as small as possible.

the thing is, you can't "disable chat" and "putting it away" doesn't mean you won't be able to type in it, no matter how small or "to the side" it is

yeah true
they should make that u cant type in chat or smth
somehow that would make that i and many other couldnt be toxic

> [{quoted}](name=Markoets,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jPyvFxmc,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-12T14:25:25.091+0000)
>
> yeah true
> they should make that u cant type in chat or smth
> somehow that would make that i and many other couldnt be toxic

They did make that. It's called a chat restriction. You got one.

i belive i can still type
do ur research before replying 
ty

> [{quoted}](name=Markoets,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jPyvFxmc,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-12T14:41:23.932+0000)
>
> i belive i can still type
> do ur research before replying 
> ty

Not in game you can't, until your chat restriction ends.

> [{quoted}](name=Voldymort,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jPyvFxmc,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-12T14:52:50.020+0000)
>
> i don't think you understand what a chat restriction does...
> 
> it's not a mute. he can still type messages. just very few of them

I see. I would've thought the restriction would be total. I guess OP will only be totally restricted from chat when he's banned, which, since he doesn't think he said anything inappropriate, will probably be soon.
idk i can talk in chat but iahte to wait

>Not in game you can't

i don't think you understand what a chat restriction does...

it's not a mute. he can still type messages. just very few of them

They did. It's been around since the Indus Valley civilization. It's called self control.

People who want to be part of society are expected to have it.

The system punishes people based on consistency x severity.  Meaning they can get punished for 1 game of extreme toxicity or a bunch of games with mild / moderate. 

Think of it like the health meter in music games, when you miss a bunch of notes, the meter increases rapidly. If you just miss the notes occasionally,  the health meter won't increase that much. 

Before entering that game, you probably already were at the edge of your toxicity meter, so it's easy for you to get punished. But where is the other dude in regards to his toxicity meter? Who knows, but certainly it wasn't close enough to get him punished in that game alone. 

If he keeps up with that behavior, he'll get punished. Though don't complain when you don't see a punishment notification.  The system only gives you a notification if the game you reported them in was in their reform card, and the reform card only shows you 1-5 recent games as examples of unacceptable behavior.
enjoy the punishment.

you tried to be sane in an otherwise insane world. you tried to be logical in an otherwise illogical world, you tried to be just in an otherwise vile world. Like you said, it's just a bad game. better not say a word next time and move on.
